Class Album

java.lang.Object
  Album

public class Album
extends java.lang.Object

An album is a collection of images. It reads images from a folder on disk, and it can be used to retrieve single images.

Version:
1.0
Author:
mik

Constructor Summary
Album(java.lang.String directoryName)
          Create an Album from a folder in disk.
 
Method Summary
 Image getImage(int imageNumber)
          Return a image from this album.
 int numberOfImages()
          Return the number of images in this album.
